title: NEED A ACER COMPUTER FOR LOL
body:
I need a computer for lol because I play on a iMac right now so if you guys have a suggestions ons which acer pretor computer is the best for gaming then tell me. Also if you can please tell me the best acer predator laptop so I can go to my friends houses. For both plz tell me the pros and the cons and how much they are.
Thx

replies.body: but I heard that predator is the best brand so that's why I want one of those.
I'd say most commonly people look at specs like graphic card, cpu and memory... rather than a name of the brand
